QuestData.Title: A Little Pick-me-up
QuestData.Description: Azuregos... Azuregos. Azy? The dragon? We're friends, definitely! Taught me to speak. Said he liked my hue... kinda colorist, eh?$B$BDon't remember where he went. Mmm... maybe something to help my memory?$B$BI plant Kawphi plants all over the beach. They like sand. Kinda weird.$B$BCould you go collect some?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Kawphi Beans from the plants in the Ruins of Arkkoran.
QuestData.CompletionText: So tired, it's hard to concentrate.
QuestData.RewardText: Beautiful beans! They smell absolutely delicious, don't they?
